discussion.author: iagochavarry
discussion.text:
Hello Community!

I'm aware of the naming guidelines for automatic merging, but.. :)

PWF.jl is a package exclusively dedicated to reading ".PWF" files, which is the extension used in the Brazilian Power System's cases. Like CSV.jl, which is dedicated to read/parse CSV files into Julia, PWF.jl would like to be registered exactly like the file extension name. This would improve the package reach in the Electricity power system community

Is it possible?

Cheers!

discussion.author: iagochavarry
discussion.text:
Thanks for closing the previous PR @giordano!

Do you think that the name of the package can be PWF.jl due to the reasons given above? If you need, I can give a little bit more context :)
